Modul CineTrack
Package org.com.controller.authentication

Klasse RegisterController

java.lang.Object
org.com.controller.authentication.RegisterController
public class RegisterController extends Object
Controller class responsible for handling user registration in the application. This class manages the registration process and navigation between the registration and login views.

Dependencies include:

  • AuthenticationController for handling authentication logic.
  • ViewLoaderService for managing view transitions.
  • DialogService for displaying alerts and error messages.
  • LogService for logging application events.
Version:
1.0
Autor:
umut

  • Konstruktordetails

    • RegisterController

      public RegisterController()

  • Methodendetails

    • handleRegistration

      private void handleRegistration(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the user registration process when the register button is clicked. Validates the input, attempts to register the user, and displays appropriate success or error messages. If registration is successful, navigates to the login view.
      Parameter:
      event - the ActionEvent triggered by the register button.

    • switchToLogin

      private void switchToLogin(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Navigates the user to the login view when the login switch button is clicked. Displays an error dialog if the navigation fails.
      Parameter:
      event - the ActionEvent triggered by the navigation request.
